language.name: English
language.selectorDescription: Choose the language used for the accessibility tools interface.

heading.title: Accessibility Tools
heading.subtitle: Fine-tune colours, typography and focus helpers with a refreshed look.

fontDyslexia.label: Font Dyslexia
fontDyslexia.description: Toggle a dyslexia-friendly font stack across the page without altering the accessibility menu.

textAlign.label: Text Align
textAlign.description: Choose how text should align across the page. Click repeatedly to cycle through the available alignments; after the last option the alignment returns to the site default.

reduceMotion.label: Reduce Motion
reduceMotion.description: Stop animated, blinking, and flashing visuals from playing automatically across the page.

position.left: Dock widget to the left edge
position.top: Dock widget to the top edge
position.topLeft: Dock widget to the top-left corner
position.topRight: Dock widget to the top-right corner
position.bottom: Dock widget to the bottom edge
position.bottomLeft: Dock widget to the bottom-left corner
position.bottomRight: Dock widget to the bottom-right corner
position.right: Dock widget to the right edge

filters.empty: No tools match your search. Try a different keyword or category.

details.persistence: Your selection is saved for future visits when storage is available.

descriptions.invertColours: Invert page colours to reduce glare and boost contrast for light sensitivity.
descriptions.grayscale: Convert colours to grayscale for readers who prefer neutral tones without distractions.
descriptions.lowSaturation: Cycle between muted and amplified colour saturation to improve focus or visibility.
descriptions.contrast: Increase or decrease contrast levels to match ambient light or personal comfort.
descriptions.hideImages: Temporarily remove decorative imagery so readers can concentrate on text content.
descriptions.hideVideo: Hide auto-playing or distracting video embeds until you are ready to interact with them.
descriptions.reduceMotion: Pause animated effects and autoplaying media to prevent motion sensitivity.
descriptions.fontSize: Increase body copy size in gentle steps so paragraphs stay readable on every screen.
descriptions.lineHeight: Add breathing room between lines of text to support dyslexia and low-vision readers.
descriptions.letterSpacing: Loosen the spacing between letters for improved legibility at a glance.
descriptions.fontDyslexia: Switch to the OpenDyslexic font stack for recognisable letter shapes and calmer reading.
descriptions.textAlign: Cycle through start, centre, end and justified text alignment without editing CSS manually.
descriptions.linksHighlight: Highlight links with strong underlines and colour so keyboard and screen reader users can skim quickly.
descriptions.changeCursors: Swap between focus, spotlight and reading guides to track content while navigating.

textAlign.reset: Text alignment restored to the site default.
